name: Autopunch
description: Automatically host without forwarding your ports, with any other Autopunch user.
author: delthas

descriptionI18n.content: Automatically host without forwarding your ports, with any other Autopunch user.

name: BGMChanger
description:
Lets you replace some of the game BGMs.
(Only supports the OGG Vorbis format)

descriptionI18n.content:
Lets you replace some of the game BGMs.

name: ChainCFix
description: Fix for the desync on Remilia's chain gang C version.

descriptionI18n.content: Fix for the desync on Remilia's chain gang C version.

name: CharactersInForeground
description:
Draw characters over HP bars, for better clarity.

Toggle whether you have it on or not with the Tab key in character select by default. Also shows whether your opponent has it on.
author: Ichirin

descriptionI18n.content:
Draw characters over HP bars, for better clarity.

Toggle whether you have it on or not with the Tab key in character select by default. Also shows whether your opponent has it on.

name: DesyncProtector
description: **Doesn't work with GiuRoll**. Protects players and spectators from desynchronization caused by any game weather.

descriptionI18n.content: **Doesn't work with GiuRoll**. Protects players and spectators from desynchronization caused by any game weather.

descriptionI18n.content: Fixes a bug in the game that causes the game to crash when you change, add or remove an audio device

name: EasyDecks
description: Edit your decks freely during a netplay session.

descriptionI18n.content: Edit your decks freely during a netplay session.

name: FixMeiling236
description:
Fixes the desync bug related to Meiling d236.
Already included in Giuroll.

descriptionI18n.content:
Fixes the desync bug related to Meiling d236.

name: giuroll
description:
New rollback netcode.
Also provides replay rewind.
author: Giufin, Hagb

descriptionI18n.content:
New rollback netcode.
Also provides replay rewind.

recommendedVersion.notes:
Changelog (0.6.17-3 -> 0.6.17-4):
Fixed many grammar and spelling errors in the comments of giuroll.ini.
Fixed an undefined behavior that crashes the game in netplay when running in box86, which is what Winlator is based on.
Made warnings and camera smoothing compatible with SokuDirectXOptimizations.
Implemented reproducible building.

name: Giuroll-UI
description: Extra graphical features for Giuroll.
author: _Kookie

descriptionI18n.content: Extra graphical features for Giuroll.

name: HoldEscOnline
description:
During VS Network matches, pressing Esc will instantly leave the match.
To avoid accidental Esc presses, this mod will change the Esc press into a 2 seconds hold.
author: PC_volt

descriptionI18n.content:
During VS Network matches, pressing Esc will instantly leave the match.
To avoid accidental Esc presses, this mod will change the Esc press into a 2 seconds hold.

description: InfiniteDecks allows you to create any number of decks you want so no need to have many different profiles to have more than 4 decks.

Overhauls the palette system.
Unlimited amount of palettes, no more messing with th123e.dat, and more.

Overhauls the palette system.

**Obsolete with giuroll.**

name: VolumeChanger
description:
VolumeChanger mod allows you to change the BGM and SE voulume anytime you want instead of only in Config menu. 
The default hotkeys are "Ctrl+M" to increase BGM, "Ctrl+N" to decrease BGM, "Ctrl+B" to increase SE, "Ctrl+V" to decrease SE
author: Co1umbium

descriptionI18n.content:
VolumeChanger mod allows you to change the BGM and SE voulume anytime you want instead of only in Config menu. 
The default hotkeys are "Ctrl+M" to increase BGM, "Ctrl+N" to decrease BGM, "Ctrl+B" to increase SE, "Ctrl+V" to decrease SE

name: SokuDirectXOptimizations
description:
This mod optimizes Hisoutensoku's DirectX handling by making rendering parallel with game processing, reducing frame drops and preventing gameplay slowdowns even during performance issues. It speeds up texture loading, supports DirectX 9Ex for lower memory and CPU usage, and includes an optional VSync feature. All players, regardless of hardware, are encouraged to use this mod for a smoother gaming experience.


It is recommended to use this mod with Giuroll >= 0.6.17-4-hagb. Please send feedback to @Hagb if you see any unexpected thing. Your feedback is important!
author: Hagb

descriptionI18n.content:
This mod optimizes Hisoutensoku's DirectX handling by making rendering parallel with game processing, reducing frame drops and preventing gameplay slowdowns even during performance issues. It speeds up texture loading, supports DirectX 9Ex for lower memory and CPU usage, and includes an optional VSync feature. All players, regardless of hardware, are encouraged to use this mod for a smoother gaming experience.


It is recommended to use this mod with Giuroll >= 0.6.17-4-hagb. Please send feedback to @Hagb if you see any unexpected thing. Your feedback is important!
